trans-unit.source: Creates a subscription to workflow tracking records in a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Tracking.TrackingParticipant" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Tracking.TrackingParticipant" /> 中创建工作流跟踪记录订阅。

trans-unit.source: The queries defined within the tracking profile define the kinds of events that are returned by the subscription.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪配置文件中定义的查询定义订阅返回的事件类型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Tracking.TrackingProfile" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Tracking.TrackingProfile" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity definition ID of the tracking profile.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置跟踪配置文件的活动定义 ID。

trans-unit.source: The activity definition ID.
trans-unit.target: 活动定义 ID。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that filters tracking records emitted from nested activities within a top level activity (activities that compose the implementation of another activity.)
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值对从顶级活动内的嵌套活动（构成另一个活动的实现的活动）中发出的跟踪记录进行筛选。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Activities.Tracking.ImplementationVisibility" /> object that indicates the scope of records to be filtered.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Tracking.ImplementationVisibility" /> 对象，该对象指示要筛选的记录的范围。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Activities.Tracking.ImplementationVisibility.RootScope" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Activities.Tracking.ImplementationVisibility.RootScope" />。

trans-unit.source: Tracking records can be filtered using two visibility modes within a tracking profile.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用跟踪配置文件内的两种可见性模式对跟踪记录进行筛选。

trans-unit.source: The visibility mode specifies the activities being tracked within the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 可见性模式指定正在工作流内跟踪的活动。

trans-unit.source: The visibility modes specified by the implementationVisibility setting in the tracking profile are:
trans-unit.target: 由跟踪配置文件中的 implementationVisibility 设置指定的可见性模式包括：

trans-unit.source: This setting applies to the filtering of tracking records for composite activities (activities that contain other activities within its implementation.)
trans-unit.target: 此设置适用于复合活动（在其实现中包含其他活动的活动）跟踪记录的筛选。

trans-unit.source: If **implementationVisibility** is **RootScope** and the composite activity is not the root activity for the workflow, only the top level activity within the composite activity is tracked.
trans-unit.target: 如果**implementationVisibility**是**RootScope**和复合活动不是工作流的根活动，跟踪仅复合活动中的顶级活动。

trans-unit.source: When set to **RootScope**, this flag suppresses the tracking records for activities that are not visible from the root of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为**RootScope**，此标志禁止显示的是不可见的工作流根活动的跟踪记录。

trans-unit.source: Only the root activity and its implementation are tracked.
trans-unit.target: 只会跟踪根活动及其实现。

trans-unit.source: If the implementation contains activities that are composite activities, then the composite activity is tracked but not its implementation.
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现包含的活动是复合活动，则系统将跟踪此复合活动而不是其实现。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a composite activity is created that is implemented as "MyActivity" with an implementation containing "Activity1" and "Activity2", and **implementationVisibility** is set to **RootScope**, when this activity is added to a workflow tracking records are emitted only for "MyActivity" and not "Activity1" or "Activity2".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果创建复合活动，该实现为"MyActivity"与包含"Activity1"和"Activity2"实现和**implementationVisibility**设置为**RootScope**，当此活动添加到工作流跟踪仅为"MyActivity"并不是"Activity1"或"Activity2"发出记录。

trans-unit.source: If **implementationVisibility** is set to **All**, then tracking records for "MyActivity", "Activity1", and "Activity2" are emitted.
trans-unit.target: 如果**implementationVisibility**设置为**所有**、 然后跟踪记录"MyActivity"、"Activity1"和"Activity2"发出。

trans-unit.source: Gets the display name of the tracking profile.
trans-unit.target: 获取跟踪配置文件的显示名称。

trans-unit.source: The profile name.
trans-unit.target: 配置文件名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Activities.Tracking.TrackingQuery" /> objects that define the records to which this tracking profile subscribes.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Tracking.TrackingQuery" /> 对象的集合，这些对象定义此跟踪配置文件订阅的记录。

trans-unit.source: The collection of queries.
trans-unit.target: 查询的集合。
